author: NeoBeum
body:
EDIT: Pending Review for Pull Request: https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/pull/9940

# Summary of the new feature/enhancement
Get-Service returns Property "StartType"
Set-Service sets property "StartupType" _**and also "StartType"**_

<!-- 
A clear and concise description of what the problem is that the new feature would solve.
Try formulating it in user story style (if applicable):
'As a user I want X so that Y.' with X being the being the action and Y being the value of the action.
-->

# Proposed technical implementation details (optional)
Create Alias for Set-Service to accept "StartType" as an argument.
This improves flow with property fields. (.. something that is lacking with WMI Objects and MSFT_Disks).

```
Get-Service sshd | Select *

Name                : sshd
RequiredServices    : {}
CanPauseAndContinue : False
CanShutdown         : False
CanStop             : True
DisplayName         : OpenSSH SSH Server
DependentServices   :
MachineName         : .
ServiceName         : sshd
ServicesDependedOn  : {}
ServiceHandle       : SafeServiceHandle
Status              : Running
ServiceType         : Win32OwnProcess
StartType           : Automatic
Site                :
Container           :
```

Invalid Command
```
Set-Service sshd -StartType Manual
Set-Service : A parameter cannot be found that matches parameter name 'StartType'.
```
Valid Command
```
Set-Service sshd -StartupType Manual   
```

<!-- 
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.
Consider providing an example PowerShell experience with expected result.
-->

comments.author: kvprasoon
comments.body:
Which version of PowerShell are you using ?

`Set-Service` already has this parameter.

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.management/set-service?view=powershell-6

comments.author: NeoBeum
kvprasoon
comments.body: ohk, so its about `StartType` being `StartupType`, got confused by **new feature** tagline.

comments.author: NeoBeum
comments.body:
me too.

I'm also covering sabotage where previous feature "startuptype" is replaced by "starttype" and only "starttype"
because I've seen it happen with other things... like install and re-install, re-install if previously installed
:(

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: We could resolve the inconsistency with alias.

comments.author: NeoBeum
comments.body:
Yeah, I just haven't looked through the repos to find the services functions.
I could probably do that now that I have some spare time.

comments.body:
On a side note: is the DISM Module for PS on GitHub?
I have things to add.

comments.body: @NeoBeum Please open new issue to discuss your suggestion.

title: Get-Service & Set-Service: StartType & StartupType
